text: THE BINOMIAL DISTRIBUTION 2 The Binomial Distribution Suppose 𝑋 = the number of blues which result from spinning this spinner once. 𝑋 is a Bernoulli random variable with probability of success of 𝑝 = 3 4 If the spinner is spun 𝑛 times and the number of times a blue occurs is counted then a binomial experiment has been performed. 345678 9 How to find Binomial distributions using a calculator. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RnuggcyZMSA 101112131415 𝑃 𝑋 < 2 < 0.1 1617 The mean and standard deviation of a binomial distribution 1819202122232425 EXERCISE 5.03 (PAGE 214) • Question 2, 3, 4, 7, 9
